main.title: COVID-19 Cough Data Collection Research
main.note:
Group overview
Kyushu University and Virufy, a non-profit organization that develop an artificial intelligence (AI) app that allows you to know whether cough sounds are similar to coughing in patients with respiratory diseases, are conducting clinical research (voice collection for AI learning) to collect cough sounds in preparation for the deployment of this app in Japan.

Virufy is a non-profit organization in California, USA, recognized as a tax-free public interest corporation under Section 501(c)(3) of the U.S. Internal Revenue Code.
main.paragraph1: Welcome! This survey will take approximately 5 minutes to complete.
main.errorCountry: Currently, you cannot collect coughs in your area.
main.currentSymptomsRequired: Please select at least one option.
main.symptomsStartedDateRequired: Please enter the number of days
main.currentMedicalConditionRequired: Please select at least one option.
main.servicePurposeText: Kyushu University works with Virufy to use artificial intelligence (Al) to analyze whether voice patterns are similar to coughing in patients with respiratory diseases.
main.terms: Please agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy before using

helpVirufy.title: overview
helpVirufy.introParagraph:
Welcome to our research!
This page provides an overview of the research.
*The journey takes about 5 minutes.
helpVirufy.introParagraphJapanTitle: Request to collect data on COVID-19 cough
helpVirufy.introParagraphJapanDesc:
Purpose and position of service
Kyushu University works with Virufy to use artificial intelligence (Al) to analyze whether voice patterns are similar to coughing in patients with respiratory diseases.
helpVirufy.introParagraphJapanFooter:
Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
Please agree to this before using
helpVirufy.aboutParagraph:
Before you begin, please refer to us and our research content.
I'll explain it in about 5 minutes.

consent.title: Cough Collection Consent
consent.paragraph1: Virufy cares about your privacy and is advised by licensed data privacy experts. The information and recordings you provide will only be used for the purposes described in our privacy policy and consent form. Please read the consent form:
consent.paragraph2Title: Virufy Explicit Consent to Collect Personal Information and Participate in Research Form
consent.paragraph2: Collecting smartphone data for COVID-19 screening
consent.paragraph3: By checking the below boxes, you acknowledge that you have read and understood the Virufy privacy policy, and that you are providing your explicit consent to Virufy’s collection and processing of the categories of biometric and health information enumerated below.
consent.paragraph3_brazil: If you are in Brazil, freedom, informational and clear statement "consent" for purposes of the General Personal Data Protection Act (LGPD) will serve as a legal basis for the processing of confidential personal data.
consent.certifyBrazil: I certify that I am over 18 years of age, accept the terms of this agreement, and expressly agree to the collection and processing of my personal, biological and health information.
consent.certify: I certify that I am at least 18 years old and agree to the terms of the Consent Form.
consent.agree: I agree to the terms of the Virufy Privacy Policy.
consent.collection: I hereby expressly agree to the collection and processing of my personal, biological and health information.
consent.detection: I hereby acknowledge and agree that the processing is done for the above purposes, in particular for the research and compilation of the datasets necessary for the development of artificial intelligence algorithms for device-based COVID-19 detection.
consent.signs: I hereby acknowledge and agree that the processing is done for the above purposes, in particular to train artificial intelligence algorithms that analyze cough voice records to better determine the signs of COVID-19.
consent.biometric: I hereby expressly agree that my personal, biological and health information will be shared with third parties as described in this Agreement and/or Virufy Privacy Policy.
consent.agreeConsent: I hereby acknowledge and agree that processing shall be done for the purposes indicated above and, in particular but without limitation, for research and compiling a dataset needed for the development of artificial intelligence algorithms for device-based COPD detection.
consent.agreeAIConsent: I hereby acknowledge and agree that processing shall be done for the purposes indicated above and, in particular but without limitation, for training artificial intelligence algorithms to analyze cough audio recordings to better determine signs of COPD.
consent.agreePrivacy: I hereby expressly consent to the collection and processing of my personal information, biometric information, and health information.

beforeStart.title: Before you begin...
beforeStart.subtitle: To ensure safety, we recommend:
advise_list: Use your own equipment and wear a mask if necessary.
After recording your cough, disinfect the device and its surrounding surfaces.
If you have an underlying condition that increases your risk of cough, please check with your healthcare professional before participating.
If you feel that your symptoms are worsening, please consult your local medical institution.

recordCough.title: Steps
recordCough.intro1: Find a quiet space away from others and any noise. Remove your mask if necessary. If you feel unwell, proceed calmly.
recordCough.intro2Cough: Hold your phone 20-40 cm (8-16 inches) away from your mouth and wait for the recording to begin. Cough steadily and directly toward the microphone. Avoid making sudden loud sounds.
recordCough.intro2Breath: Hold the device from its 20-40 cm mouth and do not cover or block the device with plastic or other materials.
recordCough.intro2Speech: The device20-40 cmHe speaks through his mouth and holds the device, covering it with plastic or other materials.Blocking Please do not do so.

recordSpeech.intro1: Your voice will help you understand what COVID sounds like.

recordingsIntroduction.releaseButtonStart: When you release it, start recording
recordingsIntroduction.releaseButtonStop: When you release your hand, the recording will stop

recordingsRecord.textCough: Press the "Record" button and cough lightly toward the bottom of your phone. If you feel discomfort while coughing, stop and take a break before continuing. Press "Stop" when you're done.
recordingsRecord.textBreath: Press the Record button and head towards the bottom of the phoneDeep and big breathPlease do three times.
recordingsRecord.textSpeech: Tap the recording button below to inhale deeply,<strong>I'll keep saying "aaaaah" for at least 5 seconds.</ strong>When you're done, tap the Stop button.
recordingsRecord.textCount: Click the Record button and count clearly from 1 to 10.

recordingsRecordManual.micError: If you cannot access the microphone, please upload an audio file (.wav/.mp3/.ogg)
recordingsRecordManual.micErrorDescription: Please upload your audio file here.
recordingsRecordManual.fileDurationTooShort: Please upload files that last for at least 3 seconds.
recordingsRecordManual.fileSizeTooBig: Please upload files of 5MB or less.

recordCough.intro1: When coughing, try not to cause trouble to those around you.
recordCough.intro2: In a quiet environment, press the recording button and intentionally cough 3-5 times.

recordSpeech.intro1: By recording your voice, you can learn about the COVID sound.

questionary.title: Please answer the following questions:
questionary.caption: Your responses will help improve the quality of our algorithms.
questionary.allThatApply: (You can select multiple options if applicable.)

testTaken.title: Corona test
testTaken.question: Which of the following has you ever had to be tested for a coronavirus?

resultPcrTest.question: Patients<1><0>{patientId}}</0></1>What were the results of COVID-19 tests using PCR?

patient.resultAntigenTest: Patients<1><0>{patientId}</0></1>What were the results of the rapid antigen COVID-19 test?

questionary.whenPcrTest: When did you get a PCR coronavirus test?
questionary.whenPcrTestCaption: (If you are unsure, please let me know the approximate date.)

resultPcrTest.question: What were the results of the PCR test?

questionary.whenAntibodyTest: When did you get an antibody test for COVID-19?

resultAntibodyTest.question: What were the results of the antibody test against COVID-19?

questionary.whenAntigenTest: When did you get an antigen test for the coronavirus?

whatAntigenTest.question: What antigen tests did you take?

resultAntigenTest.question: What were the results of the test?

vaccine.title: Vaccination
vaccine.question: How many times have you been given the coronavirus vaccine so far?

ethnicity.title: Race and Ethnicity
ethnicity.question: What is your race and ethnicity?
ethnicity.note: (You can select multiple options if applicable.)

biologicalSex.title: Biological Gender
biologicalSex.question: What is your gender?
biologicalSex.note: (This question is important as gender-related biological differences can affect COVID-19 symptom analysis.)

smokeLastSixMonths.title: smoking
smokeLastSixMonths.question: Are you smoking a cigarette?
smokeLastSixMonths.note: This includes all types of smoking, including paper tobacco, electronic tobacco, and shisha.
smokeLastSixMonths.question2: How many years have you smoked?

symptoms.title: Current symptoms
symptoms.question: Do you currently have any of the following symptoms?

questionary.symptomsDate: How many days ago have you started to experience symptoms such as coughing, fever, shortness of breath?

respiration.title: Current illness
respiration.subtitle: *Please be sure to fill out the details by a medical nursing staff.
respiration.question: Which respiratory illness do you currently suffer from??

options.hiv: HIV, AIDS, or immune system disorders
options.cough: Cough due to other medical conditions

predictionResult.important_note: This is an important announcement. This app does not predict your COVID-19 condition or diagnose illness, disorders, or other health conditions.
predictionResult.result_unable_text: Our algorithm cannot determine your COVID-19 status.Please submit a different cough.
predictionResult.result_positive_text: Your voice has COVID-19 indicators.Contact a medical professionaland take additional precautions.
predictionResult.result_negative_text: It appears that your voice has no indicators of COVID-19.Continuing to take appropriate measures based on the advice of medical professionals or relevant regulatory bodies; Reevaluate yourself every day with the app.

thankyou.title: Thanks to your contribution
thankyou.paragraph1:
We've taken one step closer ro
protecting the world's health.
thankyou.paragraph1_cough: Thanks to your cough donations, Virufy has stepped up another step towards a world-changing goal.
thankyou.paragraph1_voice: With your cough donation, Virufy takes you a step closer to changing the world.
thankyou.paragraph3:
The data you've provided will be analyzed and used for research to help improve healthcare globally.

If you have any questions about your data or need support, please feel free to contact us.
thankyou.paragraph4: To improve your application<1>feedback</1>Provides and<3>Website</3>Please check it out.
